pull.title: doc: Update work in progress section in `doc/design/libraries.md`
pull.body:
- The discussion of libbitcoinkernel has moved from 24303 to 27587
- Issue 15732 has been resolved, removing it from the document

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -109,5 +109,5 @@ class bitcoin-qt,bitcoind,bitcoin-cli,bitcoin-wallet bold
 
 ## Work in progress
 
-- Validation code is moving from *libbitcoin_node* to *libbitcoin_kernel* as part of [The libbitcoinkernel Project #24303](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/24303)
+- Validation code is moving from *libbitcoin_node* to *libbitcoin_kernel* as part of [The libbitcoinkernel Project #27587](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/27587)
 - Source code organization is discussed in general in [Library source code organization #15732](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/15732)
comments.body: Not sure how much internal library design is left to be done here. Also, the other issue seems to be closed/resolved, so maybe this whole section can be removed? Obviously the library design isn't final, and will change in the future, but I am not sure if the document is the right place to keep track of (and update with) all brainstorming issues about library build design.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -109,5 +109,5 @@ class bitcoin-qt,bitcoind,bitcoin-cli,bitcoin-wallet bold
 
 ## Work in progress
 
-- Validation code is moving from *libbitcoin_node* to *libbitcoin_kernel* as part of [The libbitcoinkernel Project #24303](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/24303)
+- Validation code is moving from *libbitcoin_node* to *libbitcoin_kernel* as part of [The libbitcoinkernel Project #27587](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/27587)
 - Source code organization is discussed in general in [Library source code organization #15732](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/15732)
comments.body: The actual PR for getting the internal design w.r.t. kernel done is still waiting: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28690 (see my last comment there). I think it is fine to link the tracking issue to reduce confusion?

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -109,5 +109,5 @@ class bitcoin-qt,bitcoind,bitcoin-cli,bitcoin-wallet bold
 
 ## Work in progress
 
-- Validation code is moving from *libbitcoin_node* to *libbitcoin_kernel* as part of [The libbitcoinkernel Project #24303](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/24303)
+- Validation code is moving from *libbitcoin_node* to *libbitcoin_kernel* as part of [The libbitcoinkernel Project #27587](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/27587)
 - Source code organization is discussed in general in [Library source code organization #15732](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/15732)
comments.body: Sure sounds good to keep the link to 27587/28690. I still think that the link to the closed 15732 can be removed, because any relevant details are inside this document already, but that can also be done in a follow-up.

comments.body: I didn't notice, thanks! Pushed a commit to remove 15732.
